column1: Baby Barnaby's////This is my go-to breakfast place in Houston. I come here probably 2-3 times per month. Baby Barnaby's is in the heart of Montrose
column3: but has a ton of personality. The staff greets guests by first name
column5: and goes the extra yard. The food here is . Quality
column6: wholesome ingredients that will fill you up. I typically get the breakfast plate with eggs
column8: bacon and wheat toast. If you are visiting Houston
column9: Barnaby's breakfast is a must. Especially Baby Barnaby's. 5/5 on this one.
